text: Charles Gallagher (3 November 1940 – 11 July 2021) was a Scottish-Irish footballer. He played as an inside forward.Gifted in Green, Adam Ward, 1999. PB) p.37 He played mainly for Celtic and Dumbarton. He played for the Republic of Ireland, making two appearances for the team in 1967.
